channel.title: Keep getting error..JDK
channel.description:
You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0.Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial on the moparscape tutorials section for a direct link to download the newest JDK update. Press any key to continue...
That's what i get when i try to compile.. And I have all the JDK updates... Anyone have any idea's what's wrong?:(

item.title: Keep getting error..JDK
item.dc:creator: @pissed_bouz pissed bouz

the system cannot find the path specified.

Whyyyyy.

I’m completely outof ideas…

item.title: Keep getting error..JDK
item.dc:creator: @onexan onexan
item.description:
@onexan wrote:

Mod tharoks , dont work for me too so i maked simple compiler by my self - read next:

make a compiler by ur self -
First go to:
“C:\Program Files\Java”
then look for JDK folder, like a have:
“jdk1.6.0_03”
then go to “bin” folder
and if you see javac.exe , read next , if not reinstall JDK

Making compiler

open note pad and type:

@echo off
title Compiler

Now place of javac.exe , like my example:
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe”
And you got , save this to compile.bat , full code

@echo off
title Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

Thats it

Read full topic
